title: Last patch fuck-ups
body:
So this thread is to recap what riot fucked up in their last patch.
1) Can no longer add/edit item pages
2) Maoki's bug
3) Zelrot portal bug
4) Constant lag/game crashes/shit fps etc
5) Some people had their item pages deleted

Seriously riot what the fuck is wrong with you, you fuck up more and more every fucking day, today my game client crashed 10 times (no joke or exaggeration) before i even managed to start playing (i loaded in on the 6 minute mark), turns out 1 enemy didn't load in in the 21 min game (enemy team surrendered) and two more of my team also had client crashes and so did two other enemies (so that's 3 people each team for 6 out of 10 people had issues loading in).

After I finally managed to load in I find I have no hp/mana bars, so i restarted, (two more crashes before i load back in), came back in to find i only have 6fps (I'm running a Radeon 7900 series using a HDMI cable to my 1080P HD Tv and average 120fps in many other games so you can't say this is me), so i restart (another three crashes), by the point i manage to get back into the game its the 21 minute mark and the enemy surrenders so in 21 minutes i managed to play for about 2-3 of those minutes and the rest of the time was spent loading etc.

Seriously how badly have you fucked the client that I have 15 crashes and 2 different in game glitches and 5 other people in a 10 man game have trouble loading in, you guys need to pull your fucking shit together, I've stopped playing lol entirely unless I have a mate who wants to play a duo game with me and even then I'm now reluctant to even play seeing as you now get 20 min timers on 5 games if you dc twice (ive now had 3 sets of these timers from game crashes/dc/lag and the fucking things have only been out for about 2 monthes)

Before the last patch I'd dc'd
